meanings.definition: A building with no elevator, requiring occupants to walk up stairs to reach their apartments.
meanings.sent1: The walkup was challenging for the elderly residents.
meanings.sent2: I live in a cozy walkup on the third floor.
meanings.sent3: The cat attempted to climb the walkup stairs with hilarious results.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to conquer the walkup was like scaling a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The walkup stairs seemed never-ending, like a stairway to the clouds.

meanings.definition: A type of apartment located on a higher floor of a building, typically accessed by stairs.
meanings.sent1: The walkup apartment had a beautiful view of the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys the natural light in her walkup unit.
meanings.sent3: The walkup apartment felt like a cozy nest in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Living in a walkup felt like being on top of the world.
meanings.sent5: The walkup unit provided a peaceful retreat from the bustling city below.
